title: Purdy & Figg | Counter Clean Mixed Refill Kit | All-Purpose Cleaning Spray with Organic Essential Oils | Natural & Non-Toxic | Home & Kitchen Countertops | Citrus/Floral/Vetiver Scents
features: All-in-One Effective Surface Cleaning Concentrate Refill Kit- Tackle grease, grime & dirt with Purdy & Figg's Counter Clean Refill Kit! This all-purpose cleaner sanitizes countertops, floors, sinks, tables & more without residue. Cost-effective at just £1.25 per week ideal for kitchens, offices & homes!

Natural & Non-Toxic Formula – Made with 100% natural, organic ingredients & essential oils, this household cleaner is phthalate-free, non-GMO & family-safe. Perfect for kitchens, countertops & surfaces, it removes grease, grime, dirt & limescale, leaving a fresh scent for a clean healthy home!

Effortless Cleaning in 3 Steps – Mix our non-toxic kitchen cleaner with water, shake & spray for a powerful clean—no scrubbing needed! This versatile surface spray removes grease, grime & dirt from countertops, sinks & tables. Includes Citrus, Floral & Vetiver concentrates.

Complete Cleaning Kit – Pack of 3 x 20ml eco-concentrate refills (Citrus, Floral & Vetiver) to top up your Counter Clean Bottle. Each concentrate expands 13x to create a 300ml powerful, non-toxic cleaner for kitchens, countertops & surfaces, made with pure essential oils.

A Natural & Sustainable Way to Clean – Purdy & Figg offers a safe, non-toxic, and organic alternative to ordinary cleaners. This gentle yet effective set keeps your home fresh, clean & healthy while filling it with natural fragrance—an eco-friendly choice for a better clean!
description: Product Description Counter Clean – All-in-One Shine Counter Clean is an all-purpose surface and multisurface cleaner, effective on stone, wood, and glass. It’s a go-to cleaning product. Powerful Clean, No Toxins One powerful, natural kitchen cleaning spray for your entire home, ditching toxic chemicals while keeping surfaces fresh and clean. Natural Clean, Zero Waste P&F Counter Clean multipurpose spray is a natural kitchen and surface cleaner with effective power and a zero-waste refill system. Ditch Toxins, Clean Naturally Toxic cleaners are replaced with a natural multipurpose spray offering powerful kitchen and surface cleaning that's safe and effective. Refillable Clean with Lasting Freshness Counter Clean is a natural refillable cleaning spray that is a powerful multipurpose surface and kitchen cleaner with a lasting scent.
